Space Integrity Initiative

The Space Integrity Initiative is a global framework advancing trust, transparency, and responsible practice across the space sector. We support organisations in adopting shared principles, integrity indicators, and credible communication standards that strengthen governance, sustainability, and stakeholder confidence.
